Developpez.com

I am an active member of the community Developpez.com since 2007. Since April 2012, I am redactor and moderator for the Semantic Web section.

  • Involved in the translation of a tutorial about D2RQ engine.
  • Several contributions to the Q/A of the section.

Firefighter

After serving for four years as young firefighter, I joined the fire and rescue center of Marcigny (Sa√¥ne et Loire, Burgundy, France) in 2004 as a volunteer firefighter and stopped in 2014. I continue to practice first aid as a first aid worker.
